discoverScript.title: Discover Script
discoverScript.description: Script to discover what to collect. Should output one task per line in stdout.

collectScript.title: Collect Script
collectScript.description: Script to run to perform data collections. Task passed in as $CRIBL_COLLECT_ARG. Should output results to stdout.

shell.title: Shell
shell.description: Shell to use to execute scripts.

envVars.title: Environment Variables
envVars.description: Environment variables to expose to the discover and collect scripts.

value.title: Value
value.description: JavaScript expression to compute environment variable's value, enclosed in quotes or backticks. (Can evaluate to a constant.)
